verses.verse: Then He brought <S%H7725><s%> me back <S%H7725><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the outer <S%H2435><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> which faces <S%H6437><s%> the east; <S%H6921><s%> and it was shut. <S%H5462><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "This <S%H2088><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> shall be shut; <S%H5462><s%> it shall not be opened, <S%H6605><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H376><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> by it, for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has entered <S%H935><s%> by it; therefore it shall be shut. <S%H5462><s%>

"As for the prince, <S%H5387><s%> he shall sit <S%H3427><s%> in it as prince <S%H5387><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> he shall enter <S%H935><s%> by way <S%H1870><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and shall go <S%H3318><s%> out by the same way. <S%H1870><s%>"

Then He brought <S%H935><s%> me by way <S%H1870><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> to the front <S%H6440><s%> of the house; <S%H1004><s%> and I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and I fell <S%H5307><s%> on my face. <S%H6440><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> mark <S%H7760><s%> well, <S%H3820><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> with your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> with your ears <S%H241><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I say <S%H1696><s%> to you concerning all <S%H3605><s%> the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and concerning all <S%H3605><s%> its laws; <S%H8451><s%> and mark <S%H7760><s%> well <S%H3820><s%> the entrance <S%H3996><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> exits <S%H4161><s%> of the sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>

"And you shall say <S%H559><s%> to the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> ones, <S%H4805><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Enough <S%H7227><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations, <S%H8441><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

when you brought <S%H935><s%> in foreigners, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> and uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in flesh, <S%H1320><s%> to be in My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> to profane <S%H2490><s%> it, [even] My house, <S%H1004><s%> when you offered <S%H7126><s%> My food, <S%H3899><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> and the blood; <S%H1818><s%> for they made <S%H6565><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> void <S%H6565><s%> – [this] in addition <S%H413><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

"And you have not kept <S%H8104><s%> charge <S%H4931><s%> of My holy <S%H6944><s%> things <S%H6944><s%> yourselves, but you have set <S%H7760><s%> [foreigners] to keep <S%H8104><s%> charge <S%H4931><s%> of My sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>"

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "No <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> foreigner, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> and uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> in flesh, <S%H1320><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the foreigners <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall enter <S%H935><s%> My sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>

"But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> who <S%H834><s%> went <S%H7368><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from Me, when Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H8582><s%> astray, <S%H8582><s%> who <S%H834><s%> went <S%H8582><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> from Me after <S%H310><s%> their idols, <S%H1544><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the punishment <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

"Yet they shall be ministers <S%H8334><s%> in My sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> having oversight <S%H6486><s%> at the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> and ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the house; <S%H1004><s%> they shall slaughter <S%H7819><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> for the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them to minister <S%H8334><s%> to them.

"Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> they ministered <S%H8334><s%> to them before <S%H6440><s%> their idols <S%H1544><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> a stumbling <S%H4383><s%> block <S%H4383><s%> of iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have sworn <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "that they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the punishment <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

"And they shall not come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to Me to serve <S%H3547><s%> as a priest <S%H3547><s%> to Me, nor <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to any <S%H3605><s%> of My holy <S%H6944><s%> things, <S%H6944><s%> to the things <S%H6944><s%> that are most <S%H6944><s%> holy; <S%H6944><s%> but they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame <S%H3639><s%> and their abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have committed. <S%H6213><s%>

"Yet I will appoint <S%H5414><s%> them to keep <S%H8104><s%> charge <S%H4931><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> its service, <S%H5656><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> that shall be done <S%H6213><s%> in it.

"But the Levitical <S%H3881><s%> priests, <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> who <S%H834><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> charge <S%H4931><s%> of My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> when the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H8582><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> from Me, shall come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to Me to minister <S%H8334><s%> to Me; and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me to offer <S%H7126><s%> Me the fat <S%H2459><s%> and the blood, <S%H1818><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"They shall enter <S%H935><s%> My sanctuary; <S%H4720><s%> they shall come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to My table <S%H7979><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> to Me and keep <S%H8104><s%> My charge. <S%H4931><s%>

"And it shall be that when they enter <S%H935><s%> at the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> they shall be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with linen <S%H6593><s%> garments; <S%H899><s%> and wool <S%H6785><s%> shall not be on them while they are ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> and in the house. <S%H1004><s%>

"Linen <S%H6593><s%> turbans <S%H6287><s%> shall be on their heads, <S%H7218><s%> and linen <S%H6593><s%> undergarments <S%H4370><s%> shall be on their loins; <S%H4975><s%> they shall not gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with [anything which makes them] sweat. <S%H3154><s%>

"And when they go <S%H3318><s%> out into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court, <S%H2691><s%> into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> they shall put <S%H6584><s%> off <S%H6584><s%> their garments <S%H899><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> they have been ministering <S%H8334><s%> and lay <S%H5117><s%> them in the holy <S%H6944><s%> chambers; <S%H3957><s%> then they shall put <S%H3847><s%> on other <S%H312><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> that they may not transmit <S%H6942><s%> holiness <S%H6942><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> with their garments. <S%H899><s%>

"Nor <S%H3808><s%> shall any <S%H3605><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> when they enter <S%H935><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> court. <S%H2691><s%>

"And they shall not marry <S%H3947><s%> a widow <S%H490><s%> or a divorced <S%H1644><s%> woman but shall take <S%H3947><s%> virgins <S%H1330><s%> from the offspring <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or a widow <S%H490><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is the widow <S%H490><s%> of a priest. <S%H3548><s%>

"Moreover, they shall teach <S%H3384><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> [the difference] between <S%H996><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> and the profane, <S%H2455><s%> and cause them to discern <S%H3045><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean. <S%H2889><s%>

"And in a dispute <S%H7379><s%> they shall take <S%H5975><s%> their stand <S%H5975><s%> to judge; <S%H8199><s%> they shall judge <S%H8199><s%> it according to My ordinances. <S%H4941><s%> They shall also keep <S%H8104><s%> My laws <S%H8451><s%> and My statutes <S%H2708><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> My appointed <S%H4150><s%> feasts, <S%H4150><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> My sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%>

"And they shall not go <S%H935><s%> to a dead <S%H4191><s%> person <S%H120><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> [themselves;] however, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> for father, for mother, <S%H1><s%> for son, <S%H517><s%> for daughter, <S%H1121><s%> for brother, <S%H1323><s%> or for a sister <S%H251><s%> who <S%H269><s%> has not had <S%H834><s%> a husband, <S%H1961><s%> they may defile <S%H376><s%> themselves.
"And after <S%H310><s%> he is cleansed, <S%H2893><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall elapse <S%H5608><s%> for him.

"And it shall be with regard to an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for them, [that] I am their inheritance; <S%H5159><s%> and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> them no <S%H3808><s%> possession <S%H272><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%> – I am their possession. <S%H272><s%>
